Name: Devilboo
Desc: The only thing more tempting than a devil... is Devilboo!

1.Name: Kiss of Temptation
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Enters the flying state, shooting homing bullets at enemies to deal <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> and inflict <color=#FE437E>Ether Anomaly Buildup</color>.

1.Name: Ether Activity Increase
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are at least 2 <color=#FE437E>Ether Attribute</color> characters in your squad:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> inflicts 40% more Anomaly Buildup.
After activating <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>, the coordination state lasts for 5 more seconds and can activate 4 more times.

2.Name: Ether Activity Increase
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are at least 2 <color=#FE437E>Ether Attribute</color> characters in your squad:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> inflicts 50% more Anomaly Buildup.
After activating <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>, the coordination state lasts for 6 more seconds and can activate 5 more times.

3.Name: Ether Activity Increase
3.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>

4.Name: Ether Activity Increase

5.Name: Ether Activity Increase
5.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are at least 2 <color=#FE437E>Ether Attribute</color> characters in your squad:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> inflicts 80% more Anomaly Buildup.
After activating <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>, the coordination state lasts for 9 more seconds and can activate 8 more times.

1.Name: Kiss of Confusion
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Fires a laser at the target and then enters the coordination state. Under this state, fires homing bullets in coordination with the on-field character's attacks, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> and inflicting <color=#FE437E>Ether Anomaly Buildup</color> for up to 30s or 10 activations.
